Ubuntu MATE 20.04 OS

The prior comment "won't load" is accurate but misleading..... this is a programming/installation issue the developer needs to address.

description:
It works quite well on my device, but it's really slow (it got to not responding) when using the mouse or scroll wheel to move around the 2D graph. (this is on a good computer, too)

So, if you're installing this app:
- use apt, not snap, the snap people seem to have problems getting it to work
- on the 2D graph, use arrow keys and ctrl + and ctrl -

For the people who maintain/wanna improve this app:
- If you could fix this issue, that would be awesome
summary: Cool app, but 2D is slow with the mouse

description:
this app are very aswome but need more features and fixing bugs like -x=0 make the app crash, i hope the team will work for this app.
thank you
summary: missing features and need fixing bugs

description:
Die Software legt kein Icon im Startmenü an. Noch lässt sie sich über das Terminal starten.
Das KAlgebra überhaupt instaliert ist habe ich beim update Prozess gemerkt.
Man kann es nur über "Software" -> Installierte Software starten.

Auf den ersten Blick scheint es eine brauchbare Software zu sein. Aber wenn man nicht einmal weiss das KAlgebra installiert ist nützt das einem nichts.


The Software doesn't install an Icon in Start... Neither can it be started in Terminal.
I only know the KAlgebra is installed because I sow it in update List (Software).

It locks useful. But if you don't even know that is installed you will newer know.
summary: Kein Icon im Startmenü / No Icon, no Starter

description: Дорогие разработчики, скажите пожалуйста, почему Калгебра ?
